title: Fontlab seeks new corporate ID
content:
Fontlab has decided to undertake a revamping of our corporate identity. Anyone interested in making a proposal should browse to:   
 [http://www.font.ca/html/RFP.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019230819/http:/www.font.ca/html/RFP.html)   
for details.
author: tharrson
